title: Los Revolucionarios
description: Website developed for a restaurant based on the owner's requirements to provide customers with information about their services. Additionally, administrative functions were included to allow the owner to modify the content as needed.

title: Limdala
description: Website designed to promote mental health for users. The goal is to offer resources and tools for mental wellness.

title: Computer Vision Project
description: I was part of a team work in a two-month project where the primary focus was on utilizing neural networks and computer vision methods, specifically in Python and the main subject was about detecting the maturity of fruits.
